page.title: ServerlessDays Cardiff - Speakers
page.description: One Day. One Track. One Community

speakers.talk: Connecting LEGO play experience with millions requires an innovative platform. This fueled the cloud migration of the legacy eCommerce application. This talk will walk you through the principles, the approach and the serverless technologies that made the vision a great success.

Serverless is a relatively new & with that comes a new community & new opportunities. In this talk you will learn how one woman is taking advantage of the new opportunities provided by the Serverless Ecosystem and has aligned her personal goals with business goals.
Getting the needed traceability in order to troubleshoot quickly across managed a-sync services is not simple. We would like to share our experience of how this can be done.

Serverless containers have interesting advantages, including custom runtimes and languages, multi-concurrency which can result in fewer cold starts, etc. And with community tools, it can even build those Dockerfiles for you!

Serverless has opened a whole new playing field and this very moment in time, is an opportunity to enter a new ecosystem, fast track your career, and make an impact on the business value working on projects that you never imagined were possible. In this session, Farrah will share her motivations for learning Serverless, her personal experiences working in the Serverless ecosystem, the surprising ways that these new skills have benefited her career, and why she believes that serverless can be for anyone and everyone whoâ€™s willing to learn.
